document_data.mainbody: oremaster Gustyl "the Curious" was a priest of Oghma. He took on Raegar Stoneblade to unofficially work for him, spying on wizards in Waterdeep, although he forbade Raegar from spying on Maaril the Dragonmage, or anyone from the Wands clan or Blackstaff Tower. Gustlys assistant was Phanar Manthar. Gustyl died suddenly in 1371 DR.
